1142340.name: Elo Hell - Episodes 1-5
1142340.description:
This DLC includes episodes 1-5 of the game, all of which will be out by September 2019.

Episode 6-10 will be released at a later date. Elo Hell is currently on hold due to sales not being where we need them to be. All sales generated from 1-5 will be put into a piggy bank and stored for the date in which Elo Hell can make its comeback. We still strongly believe Elo Hell is a great game, but it's also really weird, so we need to find our audience before we can risk putting more money into it.

If you would like to see more of this game, you can help by purchasing the DLC and using #SaveEloHell on social media.
1142340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
